囓字的基本解释

囓
niè
同“啮”。

囓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niè］
［《廣韻》五結切，入屑，疑。］
亦作“囓1”。
(1)咬，啃。
(2)侵蚀。
(3)缺口。
(4)姓。尧时有齧缺。见《庄子·天地》。

囓字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　囓； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页216第01
【字彙】同齧。噬也。【後漢·孔融傳】猶昆蟲之相齧。

Bite
Basic explanation of words
Bite
niè
Same as "bite".
Bite
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niè］
["Guangyun" five knots cut, into chips, doubt. ]
Also known as "Gao 1".
(1) To bite and gnaw.
(2) Erosion.
(3) Gap.
(4) Last name. There was a lack of nipples in the Yao time. See "Zhuangzi·Heaven and Earth".
Bite
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　倀; Kangxi strokes: 24; page number: page 216 01
【Vocabulary】The same bite. Bite too. [Later Han·Kong Rong Biography] They are like insects.
